title: Platform Screen Door Fault at Lakeside on East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东部东西线湖畔站站台门故障
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan Pintu Skrin Platform di Lakeside di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் லேக்ஸைடில் பிளாட்ஃபார்ம் கதவு பழுது

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Platform screen door fault has been rectified. Normal train services have resumed. We are sorry for affecting your journey.
[EWL]: Due to a platform screen door fault at #Lakeside towards #PasirRis, commuters are advised to add 15 mins train travel time from #JooKoon to #Lakeside.
